about_bonus_coins:
You can receive bonus coins when you sell or donate more foods as a seller or buy more foods as a buyer.

Bonus coins can be exchanged for goods. You can see goods on the 'Exchange bonus coins' page.
bonus_cup: A coffee cup from our brand
faqt1: What kind of app is this?
faqd1: This application assists you in avoiding food waste. Instead, you can sell them for money or just donate them to hungry people.
faqd2: Yes this app is free to sell/donate your foods. You can post your food without any fees. In case you want to sell/donate your foods faster, you can check out our paid plans.
faqt3: How can I see foods near me?
faqd3: On the home page, you can see the 'Look for nearby foods' button. Just click it and the app shows you all foods near you on the map interactively.
faqd4: Simply click the 'Add food' icon on the bottom, then fill required fields and you are ready to go.
faqt5: Can I sell/donate my foods faster?
faqd5: We recommend you our paid plans. By using our paid plans, more users would reach your foods and it helps to sell/donate them faster.
faqd6: Yes, of course, there is a profile tab on the bottom bar, just click on it and you can see your foods list with the management features.
faqt7: How to deposit money to my account?
faqd7: Just go on the profile page and click 'Deposit' or 'plus' icon. Currently, there is Uzcard option. By the way, current payments are being verified manually, in future it can be managed automatically.
faqd8: Yes, of course, expired foods can be useful for animals, livestock and even for gardening. Just switch off the 'Eatable food' option when you are posting.
faqt9: What are the benefits of paid plans?
faqd9: With the help of paid plans, more viewers can reach your foods, so it may help you to sell/donate your foods much faster.
